00028 class UMimePKCS7;
00029 class UCertificate;

00031 template <class T> class UVector;

00033 class U_EXPORT UPKCS7 {
00034 public:
00035 
00036         // Check for memory error
00037         U_MEMORY_TEST
00038 
00039         // Allocator e Deallocator
00040         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00041         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00042 
00043 private:
00044         void set(PKCS7* p7, BIO* data)
00045                 {
00046                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS7::set(%p,%p)", p7, data)
00047 
00048                 pkcs7  = p7;
00049                 indata = data;
00050                 }
00051 
00052 public:
00058         UPKCS7(PKCS7* p7 = 0, BIO* data = 0)
00059                 {
00060                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPKCS7, "%p,%p", p7, data)
00061 
00062                 set(p7, data);
00063                 }
00064 
00073         static PKCS7* readPKCS7(const UString& x, const char* format = 0);
00074 
00075         UPKCS7(const UString& x, const char* format = 0)
00076                 {
00077                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPKCS7, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x), format)
00078 
00079                 indata = 0;
00080                 pkcs7  = readPKCS7(x, format);
00081                 }
00082 
00087         void clear()
00088                 {
00089                 U_TRACE(1, "UPKCS7::clear()")
00090 
00091                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pkcs7)
00092 
00093                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(PKCS7_free, "%p", pkcs7);
00094 
00095                 pkcs7 = 0;
00096                 }
00097 
00098         ~UPKCS7();
00099 
00100         // VARIE
00101 
00102         bool isValid() const
00103                 {
00104                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS7::isValid()")
00105 
00106                 U_RETURN(pkcs7 != 0);
00107                 }
00108 
00109         PKCS7* getPKCS7() const { return pkcs7; }
00110 
00111         bool isDetached() const
00112                 {
00113                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS7::isDetached()")
00114 
00115                 bool result = (PKCS7_get_detached(pkcs7) != 0);
00116 
00117                 U_RETURN(result);
00118                 }
00119 
00120         /* if it isn't a signed-only message */
00121 
00122         bool isMessageEncrypted() const
00123                 {
00124                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS7::isMessageEncrypted()")
00125 
00126                 bool result = (PKCS7_type_is_enveloped(pkcs7) != 0);
00127 
00128                 U_RETURN(result);
00129                 }
00130 
00131         bool isMessageSignedAndEncrypted() const
00132                 {
00133                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS7::isMessageSignedAndEncrypted()")
00134 
00135                 bool result = (PKCS7_type_is_signedAndEnveloped(pkcs7) != 0);
00136 
00137                 U_RETURN(result);
00138                 }
00139 
00144         UString getEncoded(const char* format = "PEM", int max_columns = 0) const;
00145 
00152         bool verify(int flags = PKCS7_NOVERIFY) const;
00153 
00159         unsigned getSignerCertificates(UVector<UCertificate*>& vec, int flags = 0) const;
00160 
00165         UString getContent(bool* valid_content = 0) const;

00180                                                          const UString& signcert,
00181                                                          const UString& pkey,
00182                                                          const UString& passwd,
00183                                                          const UString& certs, int flags = PKCS7_BINARY);
00184 
00191         static UString writeMIME(PKCS7* pkcs7);

00200         BIO* indata; // indata is the signed data if the content is not present in pkcs7 (that is it is detached)
00201         PKCS7* pkcs7;

00204         UPKCS7(const UPKCS7&)            {}
